meanings: stand a giant among one´s colleagues

vlive.korean: 이렇게 춤으로 또 두각을 나타내버리면... If people know how good I am at dancing... 듣기 View video YGK+ : 오늘의 주우재는? 보이스온뤼
vlive.english: If people know how good I am at dancing...

vlive.korean: 이날도 두각을 나타내는 Sang Hyeon의 머리. Sang Hyeon's head stood out on the 3rd episode too. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : A.cian - We are A.cian '7월 7일, 우리 다시 만나...잠시만 안녕!'
vlive.english: Sang Hyeon's head stood out on the 3rd episode too.

vlive.korean: 2회에서도 머리 크기가 두각을 나타내고 있죠. His head still stands out on the 2nd episode too. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : A.cian - We are A.cian '7월 7일, 우리 다시 만나...잠시만 안녕!'
vlive.english: His head still stands out on the 2nd episode too.

vlive.korean: [옛날 노래에 두각 보이는 최연장자] 김범수 '보고 싶다' 김범수 '보고 싶다'! Kim Bum Soo's "I miss you!" 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : 우주소녀 이미지 증발 버라이어티 <우소보쇼> 8화
예능 프로그램에서도 여러 가지 두각을 나타내셨고 주목을 많이 받으셨는데요. but also in lots of variety shows. 듣기 View video JTBC PLUS : 골든디스크 시상식 백스테이지 인터뷰1st DAY / The 32nd Golden Disc Awards Backstage Interview 1st DAY
vlive.english: but also in lots of variety shows.

examples.korean: She was marked out for early promotion. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 조기 승진으로 두각을 드러냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was marked out for early promotion. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The backhalfer turned the game around. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 후반부에 두각을 드러낸 선수가 게임을 역전시켰다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: The backhalfer turned the game around. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He came to prominence during the World Cup in Korea. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 한국 월드컵에서 두각을 나타내었다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: He came to prominence during the World Cup in Korea. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Other pre-sales consultants in the team lack experience in implementing software. This makes me stand out and this is why I am the first choice when it comes to handling high profile accounts. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 팀 내의 다른 프리세일즈 컨설턴트들은 소프트웨어를 구축하는 경험이 부족해 제가 두각을 나타냈고 이것이 중요한 고객을 상대할 때 회사에서 가장 먼저 저를 찾는 이유이기도 합니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: Other pre-sales consultants in the team lack experience in implementing software. This makes me stand out and this is why I am the first choice when it comes to handling high profile accounts. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She first came to prominence[distinguished herself] as a pianist when she was ten. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 열 살 때 피아니스트로 처음 두각을 나타냈다 Neungyule
examples.english: She first came to prominence[distinguished herself] as a pianist when she was ten. Add to Wordbook
